value.title: Power BI Relationships Not Working? How to Add Missing Values Yourself 💪 [Part 3]
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Relationships not working? It can be so frustrating when that happens. In this video we discuss how you can fix Missing or Blank Values when using Power BI Relationship  Part 1 Video: Debug Relationships https://youtu.be/eT2NV2MNaLw  Part 2 Video: Missing and Blank Values https://youtu.be/37kTdyo4OOc

value.title: Power BI vs. Tableau: How to make them work together!
value.excerpt: In battle of Power BI vs. Tableau, can we instead make them work together? Find out in the video and let me know if this approach makes sense to you. value.title: Top 5 Power BI Beginner Mistakes...⚠️You Don't Want to Make!⚠️

value.title: Use Power BI to Combine CSV and Excel Files from a Folder (#TalkPowerBI Question from Brian)
value.excerpt: Brian asked this question in our LIVE Talk Power BI show.
